key_deliverables: AKS Cluster, PostgreSQL, Auth Strategy, Mobile DB Schema
demo_objectives: Show Terraform apply success; Demonstrate Login flow; Show Mobile DB init
success_criteria: Infra deployed to Dev; Auth API returns 200; Mobile app launches with DB
risk_factors: Azure AD B2C complexity; Terraform state management
mitigation_strategies: Spike on B2C config; Use remote state locking
burndown_target: Steady progress, finish infra by Day 5

key_deliverables: Routing Engine, Product API, WebSocket Gateway, Mobile Sync
demo_objectives: Show API creating product; Show routing query result; Demonstrate offline sync
success_criteria: Routing accuracy > 95%; Sync works after airplane mode
risk_factors: Sync conflict logic complexity; PostGIS query performance
mitigation_strategies: Implement detailed logging; Load test queries early
burndown_target: Back-loaded due to sync complexity, aim for code freeze Day 8
